akn:content.akn:p: § 604. Omitted Editorial Notes Codification Section, Pub. L. 94–440, title V, § 500, Oct. 1, 1976, 90 Stat. 1452, the Legislative Appropriation Act, 1977, which authorized the Congressional Budget Office to contract without regard to section 5 of former Title 41, Public Contracts, applied to fiscal year 1977 and was not repeated in subsequent appropriation acts. Similar provisions were contained in the following prior appropriation act: Pub. L. 94–157, title I, Dec. 18, 1975, 89 Stat. 834.
